reviews.title: Quiet, comfortable and classy stay

reviews.text: The rooms are lovely and all have spas. They are very very clean and everyday you come in to a homemade goodie waiting for you.
reviews.title: A delightful stay

reviews.text: It is a little bit out of town so you wouldnt really be able to walk to the city centre/ resturants etc.
reviews.title: Probably the most laid back B&B ever stayed in with fantastic hosts

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in April 2012 and found the hosts wonderful - from providing recommendations for things to do during our limited stay in Albany, to wonderful rooms and the freshly cooked breakfast in the morning. Amazing location right on the beach and close to walking trails.
reviews.title: Wonderful service and accommodation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here in January 2012. What a beautiful place the Beach House is, we didnt want to leave. The whole ambience of the place is welcoming and friendly, and our hosts were extremely helpful giving us information about the area. Our room was perfect and the breakfast was great. Super location, the stunning beach is just 5 minutes walk away and the town 10 minutes drive. Albany itself impressed us too - be sure to try the Squid Shack!
reviews.title: A fabulous place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the good fortune to stay at the Beach House on Australia Day eve. Our host Sally was amazing. We felt very welcomed being escorted to our room, shown all the room features and we also enjoyed the home cooked friands left in our room. We were transported into Albany for our evening meal at no charge. On our return we enjoyed complimentary port and chocolates. The breakfast was spectacular all inclusive of home baked bread and a wonderful selection of fresh fruits and a range of home cooked hot breakfasts choices. We would recommend the Beach House to all those visiting this delightful Great Southern location in WA.
reviews.title: Best Value in Town

reviews.text: Stayed here many times and this is probably the best value hotel style accommodation in Albany.
reviews.title: Longtime visitor

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quality fittings and furnishings - I'd go for the higher spec/priced rooms which are really top spec and still very good value.
reviews.title: Sydney girl

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I felt the need to finally write a review of Beach House at Bayside which my husband and I had the pleasure to stY in for three night in July. From the moment you step into the Reception area the wonderful feeling you will have the the whole of your stay begins. We were greeted by Sally who is Keith and Janets daughter and she is such a beautiful lady who makes you think that she has just been waiting for you to arrive. Our room was so beautiful and the afternoon tea of home made cakes was such a treat to come bac to each afternoon after a tiring day of exploring all that Albany has t offer. There are so many things that Keith, Anet and Sally did during our stay but just a few were lending us bikes for us to ride along the beach track(great fun) recommending the best Restuarants to eat, cooking the most fantastic breakfasts each morning, nothing was too much trouble for them. We will definately be back and have told all our friends and family that they must go and stay at Beach House at Bayside as it will not disappoint. FANTASTIC!!!!!
reviews.title: Fantastic 3 days

reviews.text: Spent only one night here with friends and our 11 year old son. We had the suite and absolutely perfect for us, our friend had a room in the main house. The owners are extremely warm and welcoming and nothing is too much trouble. Very relaxed tea and coffee in the guest lounge room, great recommendation from the owners for dinner in Albany that night. Had one of the best night's sleep, was almost late for the superb breakfast. We will definitely be back for a longer stay next time.
reviews.title: Superb 5* Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only thing missing was a view of the coast from our window! We have to agree with the other recent reviews ... Janet and Keith are the perfect hosts, they couldn't do enough to help us.
reviews.title: A great place for a week end away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was terrific with just what was needed in facilities and decor. The finishing touches are just right. The location is good with a short walk to the shoreline and the golf course, nice and quiet. The breakfast as part of the price was a pleasant surprise and what a meal! It was superb. Although we were only in Albany for the night, what we saw of the town was great, plenty to see and do.
reviews.title: A Special Place
Everything just right
reviews.text: We have just spent three days at the Beach House at Bayside in Albany.It is one of the best places I have ever stayed in. The owners are charming and ready to assist you in any way that they can. The decor is lovely-Tuscan/French. The beds are very comfortable. The breakfasts are to die for and amongst other things include freshly squeezed orange juice, mixed berry compote, stewed plums and rhubarb. There is also a gourmet cooked breakfast with several alternatives. Cake is delivered to your room every afternoon and there is complimentary port and chocolates in the evening. I would recommend this place to business and holiday travellers.

reviews.title: Simply beautiful
reviews.text: I must say this is truly the best place to stay in Albany. The place is immaculate, the rooms are simply beautiful and the hospitality so warm and friendly. Breakfast is included in the room rate and must not be missed. The little things like Port, chocolates and a delicious slice of cake on your return to your room in the evening is simply heaven. Highly recommended place to stay when in Albany. Keep up the wonderful work.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As soon as you arrive you are made very welcome and are shown to your room where a glass of port and special afternoon tea treat awaits you.
reviews.title: very relaxing stay and professional staff

reviews.title: My home away from home

description: The Beach House at Bayside is a purpose built, seven room luxury Guest House / Boutique Hotel conveniently located beyond the dunes along beautiful Middleton Bay and a chip shot from the historic Albany Golf Links. The Beach House offers discerning travellers an intimate, relaxed ambiance, gracious service, privacy, comfort and warm hospitality. Hosts Keith and Janet Hillam and their daughter Sally welcome guests from around the world to Albany’s luxurious haven by the sea. The experience is true hosted country hospitality enabling to you make the most of your time in this precious region of Australia.
